message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.PF, cs.MA 

This paper deals with the transmission of updates through a communication system, which is a common topic in the networking and communication subfields of computer science. Specifically, the paper focuses on the use of HARQ (Hybrid Automatic Repeat Request) systems, which are commonly used in wireless communication networks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also deals with the optimization of transmission policies, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems). Additionally, the paper considers the system as a queue, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.SY (Systems and Control) and cs.PF (Probability).
